A submarine sandwich, also known as a sub, hoagie, hero, grinder, or one of many regional naming variations, is a sandwich that consists of a length of bread or roll split lengthwise and filled with a variety of meats, cheeses, vegetables, and condiments.
A sub sandwich is a sandwich made on a long roll of Italian or French bread, filled with a variety of deli meats, cheeses, vegetables, seasonings, and sauces.
